Dropbox is now availble in the Microsoft Store on Windows 10 and 11 - Neowin
og:title: Dropbox is now availble in the Microsoft Store on Windows 10 and 11
og:description: Dropbox has just made things a bit easier for its Windows users. Those who prefer Dropbox over other cloud storage providers can now download the app from the Microsoft Store on Windows 10 and 11.

title: Intel releases new WHQL graphics driver with fixes for Horizon Forbidden West and more - Neowin
og:title: Intel releases new WHQL graphics driver with fixes for Horizon Forbidden West and more
og:description: Intel's new Game On WHQL graphics driver is out under version 31.0.101.5382. The latest release brings fixes for Horizon Forbidden West, Starfield, and 3DMark Speed Way for supported GPUs and CPUs.

title: Microsoft adds nine more realistic-sounding AI voices for Azure AI service users - Neowin
og:title: Microsoft adds nine more realistic-sounding AI voices for Azure AI service users
og:description: Microsoft has announced that customers who access its Azure AI services can now use nine more realistic-sounding AI voices. They are designed to offer conversational responses to questions.

title: Microsoft Copilot has been banned for use by US House staff members, at least for now - Neowin
og:title: Microsoft Copilot has been banned for use by US House staff members, at least for now
og:description: A new report states that the US House of Representatives has banned its staff members from using Microsoft's Copilot AI assistant due to possible leaks "to non-House approved cloud services.

title: Microsoft is testing Windows 10-like widget button in Windows 11 - Neowin
og:title: Microsoft is testing Windows 10-like widget button in Windows 11
og:description: The latest Windows 11 preview build from the Beta Channel (22635.3420) added a new taskbar feature that makes Windows 11 look slightly like Windows 10 when the taskbar is aligned to the left.

title: Windows 11 may get a highly requested Start menu redesign, here is how to try it - Neowin
og:title: Windows 11 may get a highly requested Start menu redesign, here is how to try it
og:description: Microsoft appears to be getting ready to deliver a highly requested change to the Start menu in Windows 11: a redesigned "All apps" list. Here is how to try it in the latest preview build.

title: Microsoft Details Latest Copilot for Microsoft 365 Features - Thurrott.com
og:title: Microsoft Details Latest Copilot for Microsoft 365 Features
og:description: Back in February, Microsoft announced that it would start documenting all the new features it adds to Copilot for Microsoft 365 each month.

title: Google Sends Final Warnings About Podcasts Closure - Thurrott.com
og:title: Google Sends Final Warnings About Podcasts Closure
og:description: Google is emailing users of Google Podcasts about the imminent closure of the service this coming Tuesday.

title: Understanding Windows 11 Version 24H2 (Premium) - Thurrott.com
og:title: Understanding Windows 11 Version 24H2 (Premium)
og:description: Windows now follows a more chaotic and less predictable upgrade schedule than at any time in its history, making it difficult to know when new features will be added to the platform.

title: How to integrate custom context menu shortcuts on Windows 11 | Windows Central
og:title: How to integrate custom context menu shortcuts on Windows 11
og:description: Get faster access to apps, settings, and websites with custom context menu shortcuts.

title: The Windows 11 Taskbar is changing once more as Microsoft tries new location for the weather button | Windows Central
og:title: The Windows 11 Taskbar is changing once more as Microsoft tries new location for the weather button
og:description: The weather button will now be located on the right when the Start button is left aligned.
